code: import React from"react";import{Link,useLocation}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const{pathname}=useLocation();const active=path=>pathname===path?'active':'';return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"navbar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"top-row",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"logo",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"logo-icon",children:"\uD83C\uDF93"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"WEBSTAR INTERNATIONAL COLLEGE"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"subtitle",children:"Smart Alert"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-links",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/students",className:pathname==="/"||pathname==="/students"?active("/students"):'',children:"Students"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/attendance",className:active("/attendance"),children:"Mark Attendance"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/records",className:active("/records"),children:"Records"})]})]})});};export default Navbar;
